item.title: Shortcodes Update Logging
item.description: Here is a list of shortcodes I’ve made for this blog. Code Tabs Code {{< tabs "test_file" >}} {{< tab "cpp" >}} # cpp code here {{< /tab >}} {{< tab "python" >}} # python code here {{< /tab >}} {{< /tabs >}} Demo test_file int main(){ return 0; } def main(): return 0 Box Highlight Code {{< box-highlight type="info" >}} This is a info box.

item.title: Digest 001
item.description: Articles Neuroscience | Birds do have a brain cortexâ€”and think Source This News and Views covers the following two research articles: A neural correlate of sensory consciousness in a corvid bird A cortex-like canonical circuit in the avian forebrain Memoroir | How I got into linguistics, and what I got out of it William Labov’s account of his research career: how did he become a sociolinguists, what did he do during the years, and how did he feel about his research career.

item.title: List of 100 vision papers
item.description: Introduction This is a list of 100 vision science paper compiled by Dr. Yury Petrov when he was at Northeastern University around 2007. The original link, however, is broken. Therefore I post the information in the original page here. Dr. Yury Petrov’s selection criterion I tried to weed out all review papers. Papers in the list have been ranked based on the number of times the paper was cited as given by Google Scholar, Scopus, and Web of Science databases as of January 2007.
